column2: Bug: "Page_Begin""Page_Middle" and "Page_End" sections are picked on lines 1011 and 12 regardless what is there. So it is better to leave them there.
Bug: \r\n is not turned into a newline on "Page" entries.
Bug: "Image" sections are not activebut should.
